snippet.title: Mega Drive Longplay [166] Madou Monogatari I
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: JohnX895 

Madou Monogatari I is a role-playing video game for the Mega Drive that was the last official Sega Mega Drive game released in Japan. The game is part of the long-running Madou Monogatari series.

It is a later revision to the Game Gear version, Madou Monogatari I: Mittsu no Madou-kyuu, which is based on the original MSX and PC98 versions, and borrows heavily from the PC Engine version, Madou Monogatari I: Honou no Sotsuenji.

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
